title: Age of Seraphs
description: A rich, medium-fantasy civilization-building Vintage Story server where players guide seraphs to explore, settle, and shape the world. Featuring deep political intrigue, city planning, and community-driven storytelling, the server blends semi-realism with fun progression mechanics.
features: Guide friends and players to build and expand civilizations
Engage in political intrigue and diplomacy
Plan and design cities with strategic layouts

title: MendVR
description: "MendVR" is a chaotic multiplayer survival game built using the Godot Engine, designed from the ground up to support seamless PC and VR cross-play. Players are dropped into a procedurally generated, unforgiving world where teamwork is essential, but trust is optional. The emphasis is on fast-paced, emergent gameplay with modular crafting and building systems. Survive the relentless environment and each other. The world is dynamic and unforgiving, and it won't wait for your team to agree on a plan.
features: Supports Standalone VR, PCVR, and PC crossplay

title: Tower of Bagel
description: A "Tower-Defense-Meets-Roguelike" strategy game developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2024 in Godot. The theme was "Built to Scale." This was my first published game and a crucial learning experience in rapid prototyping. The core gameplay revolves around building and managing the multi-layered "Tower of Bagel", requiring the player to carefully plan resource allocation for each layer's purpose while defending against external threats at night. Due to initial scope struggles, nearly 90% of the code was written in the final three days before the deadline, resulting in an unpolished but interesting project.
features: Designed for the GMTK Game Jam theme "Built to Scale" through layered tower construction
Slow-paced strategy focusing on layered tower management
role: Programmer (Core Logic, Tower Building, Resource Management)
